definition[0]: similar to something else in size, number, quality etc, so that you can make a comparison
example[0]: A car of comparable size would cost far more abroad.
example[1]: comparable figures for the same period of time last year
example[2]: Pluto is comparable in size to the Moon.
definition[1]: being equally important, good, bad etc
example[3]: These two artists just aren’t comparable.
example[4]: His poetry is hardly comparable with Shakespeare’s.
